name: cosine
description:
cosine:

cosine is a minimalist, addicting game for android phones where you play as a sine wave avoiding enemies. tap to invert the wave to dodge the red dots that try to kill you.

made with godot

everyone who tested this game said it was fun so i guess try it out?

up to you

privacy policy:

we don't store your personal data

your high score is stored on your own device; that's it

not a virus
